ch.nolix.system.client

Class StandardClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.OptionalSignableElement<C>
      • ch.nolix.system.client.Client<StandardClient>
        • ch.nolix.system.client.StandardClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closable, OptionalSignable<StandardClient>, Resettable, Signable<StandardClient>, Signed, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class StandardClient
extends Client<StandardClient>
    A standard client is a normal client.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StandardClient(Application<StandardClient> targetApplication)
      Creates new standard client that will connect to the given target application.
      StandardClient(DuplexController duplexController)
      Creates new standard client that: -Connects to the given target application on the given port on the machine with the given ip.
      StandardClient(java.lang.String ip, int port)
      Creates new standard client that will connect to the arbitrary application on the given port on the machine with the given ip.
      StandardClient(java.lang.String ip, int port, java.lang.String targetApplication)
      Creates new standard client that will connect to the given target application on the given port on the machine with the given ip.
